alg
Using a previously created algorithm in the code of the current algorithm.
Syntax
alg
(alg, [param : paramValue] )
Setting
Purpose
alg
Algorithm previously created in the System
param
If the selected algorithm has parameters, the System will display them
automatically
paramValue
If the algorithm contains parameters, it is necessary to define their values instead of dummy variables
null
Note
The function is called using the
button, located in the Algorithm Editor on the "Algorithm" tab.
When calling the function, a modal window opens, where it is necessary to select the previously created algorithm from the presented list and click "Done":
